T = int(input())
for i in range(T):
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    x = [a[0]]
    c = 1
    for i in a[1:]:
        if i < min(x[-1:-6:-1]):
            c += 1
        x.append(i)
    print(c)

i = int(input())
x = 0
list1 = []
while x < i:
    pp = int(input())
    ss = input().split()
    ss2 = []
    for ele in ss:
        ss2.append(int(ele))
    of = [10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000]
    ss2 = ss2[::-1]
    ss2 = ss2 + of
    ss2 = ss2[::-1]
    q = 5
    tot = 0
    while q < len(ss2):
        if ss2[q] < min(ss2[q - 5:q]):
            tot = tot + 1
        q = q + 1
    list1.append(tot)
    x = x + 1
for ele in list1:
    print(ele)

import sys
for _ in range(int(sys.stdin.readline())):
    n = int(sys.stdin.readline())
    a = tuple(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
    r = 0
    t = 5 * [751]
    for i in range(n):
        if a[i] < min(t):
            r += 1
        t = t[1:] + [a[i]]
    print(r)
